entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
